errors.error_description: The `pip install` command incorrectly tries to install `pcsc-lite`, which is a system dependency and not a Python package, causing the command to fail.
correction_candidates: Change `pcsc-lite` to `pyscard` in the pip command.
Add the `--no-deps` flag to the pip command.

errors.error_description: The link to the device permissions documentation is broken, pointing to `docs/Device_Permissions.adoc` instead of the correct `doc/Device_Permissions.adoc`.
